description: Unique sequence a such that a(1) = 2 and r(r(a)) = a != r(a), where for any sequence s of 1's and 2's, r(s(n) := length of n-th run of same symbols in s; r(a) is sequence A025142.
references: C. Kimberling, Problem 90: Run-length sequences, Mathematische Semesterberichte, 44 (1997) 94-95.
crossrefs: Differs from A014675 in many entries starting at entry 8.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
